titles.title: Recommending the integration of Lithuania into the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) at the earliest possible date.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) Lithuania should be commended for its progress toward political and economic liberty and meeting the guidelines for prospective North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) members; and (2) upon complete satisfaction of such guidelines, Lithuania should become a full NATO member and be invited to attend the NATO summit in Madrid on July 7 and 8, 1997.
